title: Bundles cost 0rp Bug (I sent support a ticket and they said come here)
body: Last night I was playing league of legends and after making a purchase of the Digital Collectors bundle my shop looked like the attached picture. I made sure not to actually use it for anything but I did feel concerned so I wrote a ticket to support and they said to make a thread here. I have the items that were left in it when purchased written down and can post the exact process if asked to by a Rioter but I would like to avoid giving an exploit out to the public so if there's a better way please let me know!

replies.body: Alright just wanted to make sure. The only items remaining were Rammus and the Goth Annie skin in case you guys want to test that one more time, thanks for responding!

Hey Laviosah,

Thanks for the report! 

We're unable to repro this issue. If something is listed as 0 RP in the store, the transaction will not complete. [This is](http://imgur.com/JoiDKhQ) what I'm currently seeing in the store.
